summary: Use a cooking pot to take gems out of jewelry and make more valuable ones.
descriptionHtml:
Use a cooking pot to take gems out of jewelry (generally destroying the non-gem material, but in some cases you can choose between the non-gem material or the gem). Also use a cooking pot to combine 2 gems into a more valuable gem. Categories in order of increasing value are:

normal*
flawless*
resplendent
radiant
brilliant
marquise
imperial
royal
spectacular
extraordinary
fabled
legendary

*In the game normally, and only up to this level can be purchased.

Gems cannot be broken down. Purely a mod for vanity and collecting, however I did make it slightly nicer on the formatting if anyone wants to use it for something else (by numbering the gems that aren't in the game from 0 to 9 in order of increasing value). Created other new items of onyx (a gem that 6 of which can be made from an ebony ingot), a copper ingot, a jade ingot, a small silver bar (when you convert a plain silver ring), and a small gold bar (when you convert a plain gold ring). 2 gems of a lower grade combine to make 1 gem of an upper grade.

[size=4][u][b]WARNING[/b][/u][/size]: This mod can allow you to extract gems even from jewelry you have enchanted (though not from jewelry you haven't enchanted) and it will not use the name of that jewelry. So if you have a "Player's ring" renamed from a silver ring with an enchantment on it, it will still be in the pool for turning it into a small silver bar. I recommend taking off such jewelry before using the cooking pot to convert items.
